sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-descriptions class="margin-top" title="详细信息" :column="2" :border="true" :data="tableData">

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        订单ID
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.oid}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        商品ID
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.cid}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        用户ID
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.uid}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        数量
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.number}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        地址
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.address}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        联系方式
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.phone}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        创建时间
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.createtime}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        订单状态
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.state}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

    <el-descriptions-item>
      <template slot="label">
        评论
      </template>
      {{this.tableData.comment}}
    </el-descriptions-item>

  </el-descriptions>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      tableData: []
    }
  },
  created(){
    this.tableData=JSON.parse(this.$route.query.data)
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.el-descriptions{
  margin:20px;
}
</style>
